survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Cycling Studios
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with indoor cycling studios to help improve services and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you attend indoor cycling classes per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity. Ensure options cover typical attendance frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you attend indoor cycling classes per week?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing an indoor cycling studio? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Ensure options cover key decision factors.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing an indoor cycling studio? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience at your current indoor cycling studio?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience at your current indoor cycling studio?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your indoor cycling experience?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 response is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your indoor cycling experience?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 response is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this indoor cycling studio to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this indoor cycling studio to a friend or colleague?
